mon.name: Genesect
mon.location: Not available in X or Y: Trade it from another game

mon.name: Chespin
mon.location: Get from Tierno in Aquacorde Town

mon.name: Fennekin
mon.location: Get from Tierno in Aquacorde Town

mon.name: Froakie
mon.location: Get from Tierno in Aquacorde Town

mon.name: Diggersby
mon.location: Route 22, or raise Bunnelby to level 20

mon.name: Fletchinder
mon.location: Friend Safari, or raise Fletchling to level 17

mon.name: Vivillon
mon.location: Friend Safari, or raise Spewpa to level 12 (Vivillon's wing color and pattern depends on the geographic location set in your 3DS)

mon.name: Pyroar
mon.location: Friend Safari, or raise Litleo to level 35

mon.name: Flabébé
mon.location: Route 4, 7 (flower color depends on where Flabébé was caught)

mon.name: Floette
mon.location: Friend Safari, or raise Flabébé to level 19

mon.name: Gogoat
mon.location: Friend Safari, or raise Skiddo to level 32

mon.name: Pangoro
mon.location: Raise Pancham to level 32 while there is a Dark-type pokémon in your party

mon.name: Furfrou
mon.location: Route 5 (change Furfrou's appearance at Friseur Furfrou in Lumiose City)

mon.name: Inkay
mon.location: Walk in grass and flowers of Route 8, Azure Bay

mon.name: Malamar
mon.location: Turn your 3DS upside-down (with the game slot pointing at the floor) before Inkay levels up to level 30 or higher. The 3DS must be upside-down before Inkay levels up. Inkay can be evolved at any level greater than 29.

mon.name: Binacle
mon.location: Use Rock Smash in Route 8, 12, Cyllage City, Ambrette Town, or Azure Bay

mon.name: Barbaracle
mon.location: Friend Safari, or raise Binacle to level 39

mon.name: Skrelp
mon.location: In Pokémon Y only, use Good Rod in Route 8, Cyllage City, or Ambrette Town

mon.name: Dragalge
mon.location: Raise Skrelp to level 48, or in Pokémon Y only, use Good Rod in Route 8, Cyllage City, or Ambrette Town

mon.name: Clauncher
mon.location: In Pokémon X only, use Good Rod in Route 8, Cyllage City, or Ambrette Town

mon.name: Clawitzer
mon.location: Raise Clauncher to level 48, or in Pokémon X only, use Good Rod in Route 8, Cyllage City, or Ambrette Town

mon.name: Tyrunt
mon.location: Take Jaw Fossil from researcher in Glittering Cave and revive it in Ambrette Town Fossil Lab

mon.name: Tyrantrum
mon.location: Raise Tyrunt to level 39 during the day

mon.name: Amaura
mon.location: Take Sail Fossil from researcher in Glittering Cave and revive it in Ambrette Town Fossil Lab

mon.name: Aurorus
mon.location: Raise Amaura to level 39 at night

mon.name: Sylveon
mon.location: Level up Eevee that knows a Fairy move and has at least two affection hearts in Pokémon-Amie

mon.name: Sliggoo
mon.location: Route 19, Friend Safari, or raise Goomy to level 40

mon.name: Goodra
mon.location: Raise Sliggoo to level 50 when it is raining

mon.name: Pumpkaboo
mon.location: Route 16, Friend Safari (Pumpkaboo comes in four sizes, randomly determined)

mon.name: Noibat
mon.location: Terminus Cave, Victory Road, Friend Safari
